data.message: Just give me "most recent" back on the mobile app. Please.

replies.message: Hey Richard. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO -Hailey

Hailey, thanks for the reply! Most recent is only available on a desktop. On my iPhone I am forced into top stories with no other option. I guess my employer likes the top stories because I am usually off FACEBOOK in less than a minute, but when I had most recent i would be engaged in FACEBOOK much much longer.

Hi Richard. To select the Most Recent News Feed on your phone, please click the More button (three lines on the top right), scroll down to the Feeds section and select Most Recent. Hope this helps! -Sarah
